data.title: Department of Family Medicine and Community Health
data.text:
18 Centre Drive, Suite 104

Monroe, NJ 08831

609-655-5178

Fax: 609-655-5284

Family Medicine at Monroe provides a full range of services designed to achieve a high level of health and functioning for every member of your family.

Who We Are

Family Medicine at Monroe is our primary care office in Monroe Township, serving the township and surrounding areas. We are your personal family physicians, providing advanced, high-quality health care for your entire family.

Our Hours

Appointments are provided Monday through Friday, 8 a.m. to 5 p.m.

Execpt Wednesday 8 a.m. to 8 p.m.

Emergency phone service provided after hours: 732-235-8993.

Our Services

Family Medicine at Monroe provides a full range of services designed to achieve a high level of health and functioning for every member of your family.

Physical exams and preventive healthcare for all ages

Comprehensive care of chronic conditions

Vaccinations

Women's health screenings and procedures

Geriatric care and Home Visit Service

Musculoskeletal care

Acute sick visits

Minor surgery and skin procedures

Osteopathic manipulative treatments

â€¦And many more services!

In addition, the Center for Healthy Aging at Monroe offers comprehensive medical care and services coordination to the geriatric population.

Our Primary Hospital Affiliate

If hospitalization is required at Robert Wood Johnson University Hospital, your care will be provided by our 24/7/365 Family Medicine team, as well as by your primary physician.

Click here to view our brochure.

For comprehensive, high-quality information on health and wellness, diseases and conditions, please click on the following link:

www.healthynj.org

More inforamtion will be provided, check back soon.
